document_data.name: Briiathor Alougarr
document_data.mainbody: '''Briiathor Alougarr''' was the Lord Warder of [[Amphail]] and an unofficial member of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[City Guard (Waterdeep)|City Guard]], though he was officially retired from that post.
document_data.Personality: Briiathor was completely loyal to [[Piergeiron the Paladinson]]. A man who disliked ceremony, Briiathor spoke quietly yet kept an eye on everything and regularly patrolled Amphail on foot at all hours of the day.
document_data.Description: Briiathor had grey eyes and a closely trimmed beard.{{Cite web enhancement/Environs of Waterdeep|8}}
document_data.History: Briiathor was an old battle-companion of [[Khelben "Blackstaff" Arunsun]]. He knew Arunsun when they adventured in the [[Wheel of Blades]] adventuring company.
